title: Stunning Video From The White House Crosses A Redline (Ep 1697)
description:
In this episode I address the stunning comments made from the Biden White House about censorship. A redline has been crossed. 

News Picks:

We’re in dangerous territory, as the Biden White House openly advocates for censorship and speech suppression.

Our national debt is reaching the point of no return. 

Does Spotify really want this fight with Rogan?

Why aren’t the liberal cancel culture advocates concerned with Snoop Dog? 

The war with Big Tech censorship heats up.

Biden court nominee refuses to say if racial discrimination is wrong.
